name: TurboTax 2023 Tax Return
summary: A TAX2023 file is a United States tax return created by the 2023 version of Intuit TurboTax, an application for U.S. residents to prepare and file tax returns. It contains tax return information for the 2023 tax year, including federal IRS tax forms, one or more state forms, and personal user-entered information. TurboTax users primarily create TAX2023 files to save their progress in the 2023 desktop version of the software, but they may also export and download returns from the 2023 online version of TurboTax as TAX2023 files to archive or transfer tax return information.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
